explains: adv. 与此同时；在此期间；另一方面
wordGroup: in the meanwhile 同时；在此期间

sentences.en: Meanwhile, my debts were mounting up.
sentences.cn: 同时，我的债务在不断增加。

sentences.en: Political stability, meanwhile, will be a prime concern.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，政治稳定将是头等大事。

sentences.en: You, meanwhile, will be skulking in the safety of the car.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，你会安全地藏在汽车里。
